content: As Val, the brief encounter with Odyl happened after the incident in the engine room. We both knew that it was part of a scheme, but there was something about the way Odyl had touched me and whispered in my ear that left me longing for more. We ended up running into each other in the hallway late at night, and before I knew it, she had pulled me into a kiss that was even more passionate than the one before. We both knew we shouldn't be doing it, but we couldn't resist the attraction between us. After a few moments, she pulled away, gave me a coy smile, and disappeared into the shadows. It left me breathless and wanting more, but also confused about what it all meant.
